channel.description: Recent content in Git on Tipnmog Blog

item.title: Go on Now Git!
item.description:
For years I have been trying to force myself to learn and use Git. Maybe the “force” myself is what has prevented me from being successful with the tool. I want to learn Git because the concept intrigues me. In my mind this is a very valid concept to maintain versions of the work I am doing on my local device and in a remote location.

Obviously I have been going about this wrong. I have chosen a direction that clearly does not work for me. So far, every attempt I have made to use and be proficient has not been the correct path for me. In the past I would start a programming project or related project and think, “I need to use Git to maintain versions and to learn the tool while working this project”.
